content.html: 3. How engineers communicate, especially with non-technical people. Being understood across domains & up the chain means knowing when to use: - plain & simple language - less or more technical detail Invest in this. It is a solid predictor of success for technical people.
content.value:
3. How engineers communicate, especially with non-technical people.

Being understood across domains & up the chain means knowing when to use:

- plain & simple language
- less or more technical detail

Invest in this. It is a solid predictor of success for technical people.
